Uses of Package
org.axiondb.engine

Packages that use org.axiondb.engine
org.axiondb.engine Core database machinery. 
org.axiondb.engine.commands AxionCommand implementations. 
org.axiondb.engine.rowiterators RowIterator implementations. 
 

Classes in org.axiondb.engine used by org.axiondb.engine
BaseArrayIndex
          Abstract base implemenation for indices that maintain an in-memory, sorted array of key values (and their associated row identifiers).
BaseBTreeIndex
          Abstract base implementation for B-Tree based indices.
BaseDatabase
          Abstract base Database implementation.
BaseDiskTable
          Abstract base disk-resident implementation of Table.
BaseIndex
          Abstract base implementation of Index.
BaseRow
          An abstract base implementation of Row, providing equals, hashCode and toString implementations.
BaseTable
          An abstract base implementation of Table.
BaseWhereNodeVisitor
          A WhereNodeVisitor that delegates incoming WhereNodes to the appropriate method.
Databases
          A static Map of Databases by name.
MemoryTable
          A memory-resident Table.

          A WhereNodeVisitor that delegates incoming WhereNodes to the appropriate method.
